CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(TEXT(CT_R_D_Stage__c) <> '', CT_R_D_Complete__c <> 0), CT_R_D_Complete__c,
if ( ( CT_Fee_Amount__c == 0 || CT_Manual_Recovery_Rate__c = 0 || ISNULL(CT_Manual_Recovery_Rate__c)),0, CT_Total_Submitted_Hours_Bill_Rate__c/ (CT_Fee_Amount__c /CT_Manual_Recovery_Rate__c)))
CustomField.label: CP % Complete
